item.title: Setting up an SDK for the ESP-01/ESP8266
item.description: ESP-OPEN-SDK on the Raspberry Pi 4B Table of Contents Introduction My Environment Espressif’s Official SDK Enter the ESP-OPEN-SDK Fix the Bash version issue Fix the ISL Library URL Fix the Expat Version Fix a GCC/C++ compatability issue Fix a Python internal API issue Fix the esptool.py issue C’est Fini! Notes Introduction Lately I’ve been focusing on honing my skills as a developer, both in coding but also in my development environment.
